page.title: 07CULWORTH PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: {The Red Lion}is the only pub on the High Street.It is a listed building and therefore of architectural and historic interest.It is owned by Manns Brewery, and was taken over by new managers in May 1985.There is a lounge,a public bar and a small garden at the back. Five to six hundred pounds worth of liquid refreshment is delivered each Friday. The locals favourite drinks are lager,brown ale and Triple Crown Bitter at around 70p a pint.The busiest times are Friday nights and Sunday lunchtime. Food has recently been introduced and includes--{PIZZA,SAUSAGE EGG AND CHIPS, OMLETTES,SCAMPI,MEALS IN A BASKET} ranging in price from $1:75 to $2:95. Opening times are 10am until 2:30 and 6pm until 11pm during weekdays,12noon until 2pm,7pm until 10:30,Sundays.The pub provides darts,pool,dominoes and a place for locals to meet.
